name: The People's Tree 2021
description:
Part of the Haunted PS1 Madvent Calendar 2021. Go check that out!

The People's Tree is an app for designing, pinning, and viewing ornaments on a single, shared tree. This is stage one for the event. Stage two opens Dec 25, 2022. Post yours now, and see what other people have posted so far!

Game + Code by Colter

3D Modeling by Cyreides

Sound + Music by Bill

Additional Code by VoidGoat

Special Thanks to NCSA, CYI, and the CLOWDER team! 

Restart the app to redo your ornament. Hold Esc to quit.
